body_html:
Hi ezyang, thanks for your hint. I just tried dlopen("./libcaffe2_gpu.dylib", RTLD_NOW); before cuda_hooks = CUDAHooksRegistry()->Create("CUDAHooks", CUDAHooksArgs{});. It gives me "Key already registered".

I will leave it to you guys, and I can help with testing, please @ me.

body:
Hi ezyang, thanks for your hint. I just tried `dlopen("./libcaffe2_gpu.dylib", RTLD_NOW);` before `cuda_hooks = CUDAHooksRegistry()->Create("CUDAHooks", CUDAHooksArgs{});`. It gives me "Key already registered".

I will leave it to you guys, and I can help with testing, please @ me.
